entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. High 6. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain showers or flurries. High plus 3.
